channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The State Department reinstates an old font, in a typeface about-face

item.title: Bessent Accelerates Regulation Overhaul to Jumpstart Growth
item.description: The Treasury Secretary unveiled changes to the Financial Stability Oversight Council to ease “overregulation.”

item.title: A Grand Jury Again Resists Trump’s Push to Re-Indict Letitia James
item.description: It was a striking rejection of the administration’s retribution campaign.

item.title: Forget flowers: These ancient plants attract pollinators by getting hot

item.title: Mexico Approves 50% Tariffs on Many Chinese Imports
item.description: The tariffs will apply to goods from China and other nations. Washington has been pressuring Mexico to move away from dealing with China.

item.title: Hamas Committed War Crimes in 2023 Attack on Israel, Amnesty International Says
item.description: The rights group said it had documented atrocities committed by Palestinian armed groups, including murder, imprisonment, torture and sexual violence.
